abstract: Jan Maxwell of "Follies" was hit by a car and will be sidelined from performances.  Meanwhile, "The Book of Mormon" star Josh Gad was injured during last Thursday's performance of the Tony Award-winning musical.
snippet: Jan Maxwell of "Follies" was hit by a car and will be sidelined from performances.  Meanwhile, "The Book of Mormon" star Josh Gad was injured during last Thursday's performance of the Tony Award-winning musical.

headline.main: Injured Broadway Stars Hope for Quick Returns to the Stage
headline.print_headline: Injured Broadway Stars Aim for Quick Comebacks
